email.subject: CFP: The International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC) | Dubrovnik, Croatia

conference_details.title: The International Symposium on Sustainable Systems Technologies and Green Computing (STGC)

call_for_papers.invitation: We are pleased to invite you to submit your original research papers, case studies, and industry insights to our upcoming symposium.

co_location.conference: 3rd International Conference on Federated Learning Technologies and Applications (FLTA 2025)

call_for_papers.aim: STS aims to address the growing demand for sustainable, energy-efficient, and resilient software systems by exploring innovative approaches in technology and system development.
topics: Technology, Sociology, and Economy for Sustainable Development
call_for_papers.publication: Accepted papers will be published in IEEE Xplore in the proceedings of FLTA 2025.

contact.name: Fahed
contact.note: Should you have any questions or require further information, please feel free to contact me directly.
